name: Inverness Graham Investments
overview:
Inverness Graham is an operationally focused, lower middle market private equity firm headquartered in suburban Philadelphia. Inverness acquires high growth, innovative manufacturing and service companies with enterprise values of less than $75M and EBITDA between $3M and $10M. Working in partnership with management teams, Inverness provides the capital, contacts and guidance necessary to drive growth and deliver superior shareholder returns.

Inverness manages $175M in capital commitments and was formed by senior executives of the Graham Group, which serves as the firms lead investment sponsor. For over 50 years, the Graham name has been synonymous with industrial innovation across a wide array of industries from packaging to aerospace. Graham’s three legacy industrial businesses operate in more than 90 locations worldwide with combined sales of $3B and its investment entities manage $3B in investment capital. Inverness continues the Graham Group’s tradition of leveraging innovation and technology to build differentiated businesses of enduring value.
